model
Class ProductItemCoordinator

java.lang.Object
  model.ProductItemCoordinator

public class ProductItemCoordinator
extends java.lang.Object

performs operations that are shared between items and products, such as moving items Wraps all of the item manager, and product manager methods

Author:
Nick
